Text: Requested InformationThe Envision Team is in the process of updating our User database and need to request additional information from you For audit purposes we now need to have your P number PID The PID is an unsecured number that is part of Enrons Global Strategy to match an employee to hisher unsecured data which consist of email address phone number mailstop company cost center and manager NO access to personal or secured data is given If you have any questions please feel free to contact us at opt Thank you EnvisionEnCompass Support Team Envision wwwetsenroncomenvision

FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGEThe Envision System will be down beginning Friday October th at pm and will remain unavailable for use until Sunday October th at am This is being done to comply with the scheduled building power outage performed by TrizecHahn Office Properties The Three Allen Center Building where the Envision equipment is located has scheduled their annual building electrical shutdown on October The shutdown is required to perform preventive maintenance on the main switchgear and any necessary repairs to electrical panels bus ducts equipment etc Access to the building will not be allowed during this power outage EnvisionEnCompass Support Team Document Mgmt and Process Automation Opt

Offline BackupsIMPORTANT MESSAGE PLEASE READ FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGE NOVEMBER The FileNET System is scheduled to be down for monthly offline backups All users including IPayIt will not be able to access the System after pm on Friday November th We anticipate users having full access on Saturday morning November th If you have any questions or concerns about this outage please feel free to call the Help Desk Option EnvisionEncompass Support Team Document Mgmt and Process Automation Opt

SYSTEM OUTAGECORRECTION PLEASE READ IMPORTANT MESSAGE PLEASE READ FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGE NOVEMBER The FileNET System is scheduled to be down for monthly offline backups All users including IPayIt will not be able to access the System after pm on Friday November th The FileNet system will not be available for use until Monday morning November th due to additional database management We apologize for any inconvenience this outage may cause If you have any questions or concerns about this outage please feel free to call the Help Desk Option EnvisionEncompass Support Team Document Mgmt and Process Automation Opt

IMPORTANT MESSAGE PLEASE READ FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGE NOVEMBER The FileNET System will be down for offline backups beginning today November th at pm and will be done Saturday until pm for databse work All users including IPayIt will not be able to access the System after pm today All users should be able to have full access to the FileNet System on Saturday at pm If you have any questions or concerns about this outage please feel free to call the Help Desk Option EnvisionEncompass Support Team Document Mgmt and Process Automation Opt

FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGEThe Envision System will be down beginning Friday October th at pm and will remain unavailable for use until Sunday October th at am This is being done to comply with the scheduled building power outage performed by TrizecHahn Office Properties The Three Allen Center Building where the Envision equipment is located has scheduled their annual building electrical shutdown on October The shutdown is required to perform preventive maintenance on the main switchgear and any necessary repairs to electrical panels bus ducts equipment etc Access to the building will not be allowed during this power outage EnvisionEnCompass Support Team Document Mgmt and Process Automation Opt

System OutageIMPORTANT MESSAGE PLEASE READ FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGE AUGUST The FileNET System is scheduled to be down for maintenance to start the upgrade process to IMS This upgrade will be done in several stages the first stage being the Oracle database For this upgrade all batches scanned or imported into queues must be cleared from the FileNET System by Friday August th at noon All users will not be able to access the System after close of business on Friday and we anticipate users having full access on Monday morning August th If you have any questions or concerns about this outage please feel free to call the Help Desk Option Document Management Team Document Mgmt and Process Automation Opt

Re FYI Reminder and REQUESTI will make a donation I am out of the office this week but will put a check in the mai to you next week Sylvia From Dana Davis ECT AM To Lisa nron Lisa CT Laynie CT Brian nron Susan nron Tammy CT Angeles CT Hope CT Stephen CT Rufino CT Brad nron Rosalyn nron Pam CT Kevin CT cc bcc Sylvia ThomasGPGFINEnron Subject FYI Reminder and REQUEST Good Morning Everybody This is just a reminder that I will be in a training class this afternoon from pm to pm but in my absence Rufino will be here to assist you Also I am helping my church raise funds for a new building We are selling Prize GiveaWay Tickets for donations of each or for The prizes are First Prize Two RoundTrip Airline Buddy Pass Tickets on Continental Airlines Second Prize inch Color TV Third Prize inch Color TV Fourth Prize CD Player The drawing for these prizes will be held during a church service Saints Night Out September If you would like to make donations and have your name entered into the drawing for these prizes cash is fine but please make check payable to Veterans Memorial UMC Thank you in advance for your support

Envision Tipis DocViews replacement Below are a few tips I hope will make using Envision a easier for you The GO TO Function is located at the bottom of the page between the green directional arrows Page where document is displayed When using the GO TO Function please type in the page number you would like to go to and press the TAB key If you press the Enter key it will temporarily lock your application and it will be necessary to end the task causing an illegal logoff meaning your password will need to be reset or your must wait minutes to log back in It is important to keep your temp directory clean Please try to check this before you open any applications To check your temp directory to go to My Computer double click on CDrive Temp Folder you will want to delete any tmp documents Text Search drop down box Flashlight on screen where image is displayed Type in the information you want to search on When the information is found the information will be displayed on a separate Yellow Page and the text you searched for will be displayed in red You can not print this page At the top of the top of the Yellow Page the following information will be displayed Occurrences of found in You searched for account it was found in document number on page To view or print this information you must first close the text search box as well as the Yellow Page Go to the page of desired information using the GO TO as described above To print the pages containing the information searched for To print selected pages you must be on the beginning page of the desired range You can now click on the Print Icon It is recommended you access Envision through the Envision Web Page located at httphomefanenroncomenvision Click on the QueryWizard icon This page should be bookmarked Click on Logon will go to logon screen to type your username and password tab to the logon key and enter You will return to the Panagon IDM Home Page Click on Search to get to the Envision Web QueryWizard
